thread.title: the perfect oscar's night
thread.title_full: the perfect oscar's night - Review of Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: susangW643XH
title: the perfect oscar's night
text: live in Harlem..no television, looking for room for the night. Gild Hall popped up, 55 inch television, delicious and extremely affordable room service from their restaurant Felice, ordered dinner and dessert AND breakfast. Delicious. Bed and pillows so comfortable. Staff so helpful and happy.
